weather.description: Mild winter days with occasional rain showers and cool evenings, but often sunny and pleasant for sightseeing.
Similar to January with gradually lengthening days and a mix of sunshine and light rain.
Spring begins to arrive with warmer afternoons and increasing sunshine, though showers remain possible.
Pleasantly warm and green, with a good balance of sunshine and occasional spring rain.
Warm and largely dry with long sunny days, ideal for beach walks and outdoor dining.
Hot and reliably sunny, marking the start of the busy beach season with very little rainfall.
Peak summer heat with intense sunshine, virtually no rain, and a lively resort atmosphere.
The hottest month of the year, crowded and sunny, perfect for beach and pool days.
Still warm and mostly sunny with slightly fewer crowds, making it a popular shoulder-season choice.
Comfortable autumn temperatures with increasing chances of rain but still many fine days.
Noticeably cooler and quieter, with a mix of mild sunny spells and rainy periods.
Cool winter weather with short days, occasional rain, and a relaxed off-season atmosphere.
